text: Kota Fukatsu (born 10 August 1984) is a Japanese football player. He plays for Iwate Grulla Morioka. ==Club statistics== Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 215 out of 289)Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "2017 J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑 (NSK MOOK)", 8 February 2017, Japan, (p. 179 out of 289) Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Other Other Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Other1 Other1 Total Total 2003 Nagoya Grampus Eight J1 League 1 0 0 0 0 0 - 1 0 2004 0 0 0 0 0 0 - 0 0 2005 Mito HollyHock J2 League 39 3 2 1 - - 41 4 2006 Nagoya Grampus Eight J1 League 3 0 0 0 3 0 - 6 0 2006 Kashiwa Reysol 0 0 1 0 0 0 - 1 0 2007 FC Gifu JFL 29 4 1 0 - - 30 4 2008 J2 League 27 0 1 0 - - 28 0 2009 FC Machida Zelvia JFL 29 1 - - - 29 1 2010 27 2 0 0 - - 29 2 2011 Tokyo Verdy J2 League 17 1 0 0 - - 17 1 2012 32 3 0 0 - - 32 3 2013 FC Machida Zelvia JFL 29 3 - - - 29 3 2014 J3 League 29 4 - - - 29 4 2015 34 1 0 0 - 2 0 36 1 2016 J2 League 13 1 0 0 – – 13 1 2017 31 0 0 0 – – 31 0 2018 38 3 1 0 – – 39 3 Total Total Total 378 26 6 1 3 0 2 0 389 27 1Includes J2/J3 Playoffs. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Chiba Prefecture
